name: JetBrains Junie命令注入漏洞
product: ["JetBrains Junie <252.284.66", "JetBrains Junie 251.284.66", "JetBrains Junie 243.284.66", "JetBrains Junie 252.284.61", "JetBrains Junie 251.284.61", "JetBrains Junie 243.284.61", "JetBrains Junie 252.284.50", "JetBrains Junie 252.284.54", "JetBrains Junie 251.284.54", "JetBrains Junie 251.284.50", "JetBrains Junie 243.284.54", "JetBrains Junie 243.284.50"]
description: JetBrains Junie是捷克JetBrains公司的一个编码代理。JetBrains Junie存在命令注入漏洞，该漏洞源于命令验证不当，攻击者可利用该漏洞导致代码执行。
solution:
厂商已发布了漏洞修复程序，请及时关注更新：
https://www.jetbrains.com/privacy-security/issues-fixed/
patch: JetBrains Junie命令注入漏洞的补丁
